prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Bass, Pipe, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Pipe, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Pipe, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This composition has Guitar, Drums, Bass, and Pipe, but Piano is not part of it.
